name: semasim-frontend
description: Parts of Semasim executed on the browser

scripts.postinstall: npm run fetch-web-assets && npm run build-all
scripts.build-all: npm run build-api && npm run build-tools && npm run build-shared && npm run build-pages && npm run tsc
scripts.build-api: cd api && npm install && npm run tsc
scripts.build-tools: cd tools && npm install && npm run tsc
scripts.build-shared: cd shared && npm install && npm run tsc
scripts.build-pages: npm run build-page-login && npm run build-page-register && npm run build-page-manager && npm run build-page-webphone
scripts.build-page-login: cd pages/login && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-page-register: cd pages/register && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-page-manager: cd pages/manager && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-page-webphone: cd pages/webphone && npm install && npm run build

author: Joseph Garrone
